item.title: Writing safe(r) bash scripts
item.description: After writing more and more bash scripts for a client, I’ve decided to write down my thoughts about it. This assumes you have some knowledge about bash, as it is not intended as a beginner’s tutorial. Why bash scripts? Bash is present in almost every unix/linux-based stack, now some Windows as well. An exception is the ‘alpine’ docker images, which have a smaller, lighter shell (more on that later) Everything that you can automate, you can do from bash.
